response.homeDescription: Escape to the English countryside within the heart of Wrigley; welcome home to 1880 Daisy Avenue. Drenched in architectural detail, this charming home offers much more space than most cottages and sits on one of the largest residential lots within the historically rich neighborhood. Enter to a jaw-dropping formal entry and living room and be inspired by the unpainted woodwork, arches, vaulted and beamed ceiling, hardwood flooring, wood windows, iron chandelier and fireplace. The formal dining room offers a darling built-in and lots of light that beams through the French door. The kitchen is large enough to contain a breakfast nook and has been refreshed with granite countertops, mosaic tile backsplash, stainless appliance suite and coordinating hardware. Both bedrooms are private and expansive, particularly the rear master bedroom with its dramatic bay window. The remodeled bathroom is gorgeous with its detailed vanity, custom tile, distinct lighting, separate shower and soaking tub. The nearly 10,000 square foot lot affords enough space for a covered porch, expansive deck and private rear yard with mature fig, orange, lime, lemon, and avocado trees. Homes like this are rarely available; secure this special property and carry on its rich legacy today.
